char_info.desc: The Maiden Who Converts Determination to Strength

a0.speaker: Emiri:
a0.dialogue: Dang it... Maybe I forgot to pray to the Archangel before this battle...

a1.speaker: Sakuya:
a1.dialogue: The one that said, 'Defend us in Battle?'

a2.speaker: Sakuya:
a2.dialogue: If gods don't exist, then angels don't exist because of no tangible proof of the existence of such entities.
